caption:
This photograph captures a seaplane in the midst of a water landing. The aircraft is depicted with its pontoons creating a wake as they touch the lake's surface, indicating the plane is either landing or taking off. It's a clear, serene day given the brightness and clarity of the scene.

The seaplane is painted in a two-tone color scheme, primarily red with white areas, and includes identifiable markings and registration numbers. The wings are extended above the main body of the aircraft, typical of high-wing aircraft designs, which provide clear visibility below and stabilize the plane during water operations.

The background showcases an idyllic autumn landscape, densely packed with trees in a variety of vibrant fall colors ranging from deep green to red, orange, and yellow shades. These trees indicate a forested area typical of a northern or mountainous region. The body of water reflects both the sky and the colorful foliage, enhancing the overall calmness and beauty of the setting.

Overall, the photograph captures a moment of action in a tranquil, picturesque environment, highlighting both the adventure of flying and the natural beauty of the landscape.
title: Seaplane taxiing on smooth water at seventh lake in the Adirondack Forest Preserve
